directions: In a large bowl, combine pistachio pudding mix, plain yogurt, vanilla yogurt and crushed pineapple. Mix until smooth. Fold in whipped topping. Cover, and refrigerate until chilled.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package instant sugar-free pistachio pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) can unsweetened crushed pineapple, undrained
title: Pineapple and Pistachio Pudding
